mutants.code:
def calculate_expected_convex_hull_area(n, vertices):
    midpoints_x = []
    midpoints_y = []
    for i in range(n):
        (x1, y1) = vertices[i]
        (x2, y2) = vertices[(i + 1) % n]
        midpoints_x.append((x1 + x2) / 2)
        midpoints_y.append((y1 + y2) / 2)
    area = 1.0
    for i in range(n):
        (x1, y1) = (midpoints_x[i], midpoints_y[i])
        (x2, y2) = (midpoints_x[(i + 1) % n], midpoints_y[(i + 1) % n])
        area += (x1 * y2 - y1 * x2) / 2
    return abs(area)

    return abs(area)
